script:
;;競争だ！,中
;;待て～！,小
;;逃げろ～！,大
# script "lisp"
# fadein "black" 0.5
# background %(background)s
# bgmfile "bgm256" "BgmSeaDate" 0
# body %(unit_a)s
# pos %(unit_a)s 3
# mask %(unit_a)s off
# chara %(unit_a)s
# textflame 0 0
@
マスターは
ヤグルシを誘って
広場に遊びに来た

# face %(unit_a)s "smile"
# voice 2017 "yagurushi_0020"
# textflame 1 1
@ヤグルシ
子供達が
元気に走り回ってるよ～！

# textflame 1 1
@ヤグルシ
いいなぁ…

# face %(unit_a)s "angry"
# textflame 1 1
@ヤグルシ
うううう、
マスター！！！

# voice 2017 "yagurushi_0029"
# textflame 1 1
@%(unitName:unit_a)s
ヤグ…
うずうずしてきたかも！！

# select "競争だ！" "select_label_01" "待て～！" "select_label_02" "逃げろ～！" "select_label_03"
ヤグ…
うずうずしてきたかも！！

# label "select_label_01"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 0.1

# label "select_label_02"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 0.1

# label "select_label_03"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 0.1

# label "select_label_end"
# waitandnext 0.1

# fadeout "black" 1.2
# waitandnext 2
